step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your shoulders and elbows close to the target. Try to keep your wrists a little steadier in future repetitions.
Your shoulder and elbow movements were good. Focus on keeping your wrists more stable as you stretch your arms overhead.
Excellent work on your shoulder and elbow form. For the next steps, try to maintain a more consistent wrist position.
Your shoulders and elbows are moving well. Keep an eye on your wrist position to ensure it stays steady throughout the movement.
Great job with your shoulders and elbows! For the final repetitions, aim for more consistent wrist alignment.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the push down pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms straight and your wrists steady as you move them overhead and then down. This helps build strength and encourages lymph flow.
